    • Method Detail

      • loadImages

        public int loadImages(java.io.File folder)
        This method reads all the files from the given folder and validates if is a JPEG PNG image.
        Parameters:
        folder - Directory This is the location where the fruit images are located.

      • processTrainingSet

        public void processTrainingSet(java.lang.String classSeparator,
                               java.io.File destinationFile,
                               CameraCalibration calibration,
                               ProgressUpdatable progress)
        This class process the loaded images to create a training set placed in the WekaClassifier (classifier).
        Parameters:
        classSeparator - The special character or expression that separates the tag from the fruit class and the name of the specific instance.
        destinationFile - The destination file where the training set will be saved.
        calibration - The calibration settings.
        progress - May be null. This is the updateable object to keep track of the progress of this method.

      • loadTrainingSet

        public boolean loadTrainingSet(java.io.File file,
                               java.lang.String classifier,
                               CameraCalibration calibration)
        Loads a training set from the given file.
        Parameters:
        file - Location of the file that contains the training set.

      • trainClassifier

        public boolean trainClassifier(java.io.File savedTrainingSet,
                               java.io.File classifierDestination,
                               java.lang.String technique,
                               java.lang.String classifier)
        Deprecated. 
        This method can only be used if either processTrainingSet or loadTrainingSet have been called. This method is deprecated, instead you should generate the dataset and use the graphical interface of Weka knowing to be more powerful.
        Parameters:
        classifierDestination - The destination file where the model will be saved.
        type - The type of machine learning that will be created.
        Returns:
        If the operation was successfully finished.
